AliceMargatroid:AlicesGrimoire.NAME: Alice's Grimoire
AliceMargatroid:AlicesGrimoire.FLAVOR: Said to record magic that can't be used by humans.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #yalicemargatroid:Place a #yalicemargatroid:Shanghai_Doll in the rightmost slot.

AliceMargatroid:SuspiciousCard.NAME: Suspicious Card
AliceMargatroid:SuspiciousCard.FLAVOR: A card found in black market. There is a Shanghai Doll painted on it.

AliceMargatroid:AlicesDarkGrimoire.NAME: Alice's Dark Grimoire
AliceMargatroid:AlicesDarkGrimoire.FLAVOR: Said to record "ultimate magic" that can't be used by humans.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #rAlice's #rGrimoire. For each present #yalicemargatroid:Doll , increase the Max HP of newly #yalicemargatroid:Placed #yalicemargatroid:Doll by #b4.

AliceMargatroid:SwordOfLight_Supernova.NAME: Sword of Light: Supernova
DESCRIPTIONS: The first #yAttack played each turn deals #b50% more damage.

AliceMargatroid:StringRing.NAME: String Ring
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat, store the rightmost #yDoll in this. NL At the start of each combat, take and #yalicemargatroid:Place a #yDoll of that kind.

AliceMargatroid:ColorContacts.NAME: Color Contacts
DESCRIPTIONS: At the first #b%d turns of each combat, gain [E], and draw 1 card.

AliceMargatroid:SacrificialDoll.NAME: Sacrificial Doll
AliceMargatroid:SacrificialDoll.FLAVOR: An unusual doll, available to partially take damage for the possessor.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, if there are empty #yalicemargatroid:Doll slots being attacked, gain #b3 Block.

AliceMargatroid:ShanghaiDollRelic.NAME: Shanghai Doll
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, deal #b4 damage to the enemy with lowest HP.
This doll makes you feel very familiar.

AliceMargatroid:BlackTeaRelic.NAME: Black Tea
AliceMargatroid:BlackTeaRelic.FLAVOR: Black Tea brewed by Alice's Dolls.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b7, and heal #b7 HP.
Black Tea brewed by little Alice.

AliceMargatroid:MagicPotion.NAME: Magic Potion
AliceMargatroid:MagicPotion.FLAVOR: Magic Power restoration drug drawn out of mushrooms from the Forest of Magic.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your 2nd turn, gain [E] [E].
